Anbil avan sertha idhai manidhare verukadheergal
vendumena ninaitha idhai veenaga midhikadheergal
uyire unnai unnai endhan vazhkai thunaiyaga erkindren erkindren
inimel puyal veyil mazhai maalai solai ivai onraga kadapome
unnai thaandi edhayum ennal yosanai seiya mudiyaadhey mudiyaadhey

Nee vaanavillaga aval vannam 7laga
andha vaanam veedaga maradho maradho
nenjodu thottuthan nee neengakudathey
kanpattu kaichal than varadho varadho

uyire unnai unnai endhan vazhkai thunaiyaga erkindren erkindren
inimel puyal veyil mazhai maalai solai ivai onraga kadapome

kandu kollum kalai arindhom endru adhai payindrom
poove vaanam kaatru theeyai neerai maatru
pudhidhai konduvandhen netru
